LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.label: rathole
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.description: A hole in the wall, most likely made by a small-bodied creature to allow them to slip in or out easily.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.label: Ratkin mining pod
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.description: A transport pod equipped with a powerful mining drill at the front of its passenger cabin, allowing its occupants to traverse deep underground.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnelSpawner.label: Seismic epicenter
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnelSpawner.label: Emerging rathole
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.label: EMP bomb
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.description: An EMP bomb, set to detonate on a timer. Must be destroyed or deconstructed to stop the countdown.
LanguageData.MinifiedEMP.label: EMP bomb (minified)
